text.content:
Armor Dent

Normal damage. Crit Effect: Deal the same amount of damage to the target's armor, ignoring that armor's Hardness.

Bludgeoning

Eye patch for you

Triple damage. Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled} until healed.

Piercing

Flat-Blade Thwack

Triple damage. You can deal bludgeoning damage instead of slashing damage.

Magical Glow

The target glows for 1 minute with the effect of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Faerie Fire]{Faerie Fire} spell.
